name: Laid to Rest
description:
Erin the adventuring ghost must help other ghosts solve problems preventing them from moving on to the afterlife.

A game by Eric Lathrop and Colton Ramos

Controls
  • Arrow keys or WASD to move
  • Enter or space to confirm
Bugs
  • Sometimes an impossible dungeon is generated
Assets Used
  • 1-Bit Pack from Kenney
  • 8-bit pusab by ISPI
